articles.description: PSG's pass masters make Declan Rice's fears come true as Arsenal struggle to keep Champions League hopes alive, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: PSG pass masters make Arsenal & Declan Rice's worst fears come true

articles.description: Inter Milan's record Champions League scorer will be bidding to beat Barca and lead his club to this season's final.
articles.title: Barcelona v Inter Milan: Lautaro Martinez's rise to the top

articles.description: Real Madrid defender Antonio Rudiger is given a six-match ban for throwing an object at the referee during their Copa del Rey final loss to Barcelona.
articles.title: Antonio Rudiger: Real Madrid defender given six-game ban for throwing object at referee

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says his side will have to "do something special in Paris" if they are to reach the Champions League final following defeat in their semi-final first leg.
articles.title: Arsenal 0-1 PSG: Mikel Arteta says his side will need something special to reach Champions League final

articles.description: Seven-time winner Ronnie O'Sullivan takes a 6-2 lead over Si Jiahui in the first session of their World Championship quarter-final.
articles.title: 2025 World Snooker Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan opens up commanding lead over Si Jiahui

articles.description: Daniel Dubois' trainer tells Oleksandr Usyk he "conned the boxing world" as the two champions meet in London before this summer's undisputed title fight.
articles.title: Usyk vs Dubois: Unified champion "conned the public" says trainer Don Charles

articles.description: The story of Vaibhav Suryavanshi's journey from a small village in India to hitting the IPL's second-fastest century, aged just 14.
articles.title: Vaibhav Suryavanshi: IPL superstar's journey to record-breaking century

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs PSG in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Arsenal vs PSG: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Grigor Dimitrov converts his third match point - over 24 hours after his first - to beat Britain's Jacob Fearnley and reach the Madrid Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Grigor Dimitrov beats Jacob Fearnley and Iga Swiatek advances as power returns in Spain

articles.description: When a photo of ultrarunner Sophie Power breastfeeding during a race went viral, it sparked a campaign for change.
articles.title: London Marathon: How ultrarunner's viral moment inspired change
